mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT(pno, pname, pprice, ptype, pavailable, pimg, prate, pdesc, foodcategory) VALUES(product_seq.nextval, #{pname}, #{pprice}, #{ptype}, #{pavailable}, #{pimg}, #{prate}, #{pdesc}, #{pfoodcategory})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT WHERE PTYPE = 'restaurant' and pname !='BPPP'

SELECT rownum idx , p.* FROM (SELECT pno, pname, pprice, ptype, pavailable, pimg, NVL2(prate,prate,0) prate, pdesc, foodcategory FROM product WHERE pname !='BPPP' and ptype = 'restaurant' order by pno) p

SELECT rownum idx , p.* FROM (SELECT pno, pname, pprice, ptype, pavailable, pimg, NVL2(prate,prate,0) prate, pdesc, foodcategory FROM product WHERE pname !='BPPP' and ptype = 'restaurant' ORDER BY pprice asc,pname asc) p

SELECT rownum idx , p.* FROM (SELECT pno, pname, pprice, ptype, pavailable, pimg, NVL2(prate,prate,0) prate, pdesc, foodcategory FROM product WHERE pname !='BPPP' and ptype = 'restaurant' ORDER BY pprice desc,pname asc) p

SELECT foodcategory,COUNT(*) categoryCnt FROM PRODUCT WHERE PTYPE ='restaurant' AND foodcategory NOT IN ('Dummy','Restaurant Booking') AND foodcategory NOT LIKE '%Dessert' GROUP BY foodcategory

SELECT rownum idx , p.* FROM (SELECT pno, pname, pprice, ptype, pavailable, pimg, NVL2(prate,prate,0) prate, pdesc, foodcategory FROM product WHERE pname !='BPPP' and ptype = 'restaurant' and foodcategory like #{category} ORDER BY pno) p

SELECT rownum idx , p.* FROM (SELECT pno, pname, pprice, ptype, pavailable, pimg, NVL2(prate,prate,0) prate, pdesc, foodcategory FROM product WHERE pname !='BPPP' and ptype = 'restaurant' and foodcategory like #{category} ORDER BY pprice ${orderBy},pname asc) p

SELECT rownum idx , p.* FROM (SELECT pno, pname, pprice, ptype, pavailable, pimg, NVL2(prate,prate,0) prate, pdesc, foodcategory FROM product WHERE pname !='BPPP' and ptype = 'restaurant' and foodcategory like #{category} ORDER BY prate ${orderBy},pname asc) p
SELECT SUM(a.categoryCnt) FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) categoryCnt FROM PRODUCT WHERE PTYPE ='restaurant' AND foodcategory like '%Dessert' GROUP BY foodcategory) a
SELECT mno,cproductQty,cproductTypePay,c.pno ,p.* FROM cart c inner join product p on c.pno = p.pno where mno = #{mno} and ptype = 'restaurant'

select count(*) from jumun j inner join JUMUN_DETAIL jd on j.jno = jd.jno where jd.jdorderdate = to_date('${date}','yyyy/mm/dd') and to_date(jd.jdordertime,'HH24:MI') > to_date('${minTime}','HH24:MI') and to_date(jd.jdordertime,'HH24:MI') < to_date('${maxTime}','HH24:MI')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JUMUN(JNO,JTOTPAY,JDATE,JCARDOWNER,JEMAIL, JPHONENO,JCARDNO,JVALIDDATE,JCARDCVC,JSTREETADDR, JSTREETNMG,JCITY,JCOUNTRY,JSTATE,JZIPCODE, JGUEST,JIFCANCEL,MNO) VALUES(JUMUN_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{jtotpay}, sysdate, #{jcardowner}, #{jemail}, #{jphoneno},#{jcardno}, #{jvaliddate} , #{jcardcvc}, #{jstreetaddr}, #{jstreetnmg}, #{jcity}, #{jcountry}, #{jstate}, #{jzipcode}, NULL, #{jifcancel}, #{mno})

INSERT INTO JUMUN_DETAIL(JNO, JDORDERDATE, JDORDERTIME, JDPRODUCTQTY, JDPRODUCTTOT, JDORDERQTY, PNO ,JDNO) VALUES (JUMUN_SEQ.CURRVAL , TO_DATE('${jdorderdate}','YYYY/MM/DD'), TO_CHAR('${jdordertime}'), #{jdproductqty,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jdproducttot}, #{jdorderqty,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pno}, JUMUNDETAIL_SEQ.NEXTVAL)
mapper.select: select * from jumun j inner join JUMUN_DETAIL jd on j.jno=jd.jno inner join PRODUCT p on jd.pno = p.pno where j.jno= (select max(jno) from jumun j where j.mno = #{mno})
